name: Aviator School
description: Aviator School trains pilots, smugglers, and repo agents in high-speed tactics, navigation, and evasion. Students here learn to command starships as extensions of their own reflexes.

majors.name: Control
majors.description: Mastery of piloting and evasive maneuvers.

majors.name: Astronavigation
majors.description: Expertise in space travel, mapping, and coordination.

majors.name: Repo
majors.description: Specializes in hijacking and reclaiming ships.

name: Cultural Studies
description: Focused on societal development, philosophy, and communication, this path is for those who aim to understand, preserve, and influence the human and alien experience.

majors.name: Fine Arts
majors.description: Study of visual and performance arts.

majors.name: Chronologist
majors.description: Specialist in historical analysis and timelines.

majors.name: Religion
majors.description: Explores theological systems and ritual practices.

majors.name: Food & Safety
majors.description: Expertise in culinary safety and nutrition science.

name: Interpersonal Studies
description: Designed for diplomats, marketers, and cultural liaisons, this school hones speech, negotiation, and influence. Grads know how to move people as easily as pieces on a board.

majors.name: Bureaucracy
majors.description: Navigates institutional systems and red tape.

majors.name: Business
majors.description: Focuses on commerce, trade, and negotiation.

majors.name: Public Speaking
majors.description: Persuasion and speechcraft training.

majors.name: Psychology
majors.description: Insight into the mind and social manipulation.

name: Military Trained
description: Combat-tested and rigorously drilled, this training prepares soldiers and specialists for battlefield and covert operations. Every graduate knows how to survive under fire.

majors.name: Infiltration
majors.description: Specializes in stealth and covert operations.

majors.name: Infantry
majors.description: Expertise in frontline combat.

majors.name: Scout
majors.description: Recon and rapid movement specialist.

majors.name: Sniper
majors.description: Long-range attack and precision.

name: Collegiate Athlete
description: Built on discipline, grit, and competitive instinct, this track produces elite physical performers. From gladiators to sports stars, these grads are all muscle and momentum.

majors.name: Team Sport
majors.description: Trained in cooperative athletic performance.

majors.name: Sword, Staff, Joust
majors.description: Expert in melee weapons and ancient sports.

majors.name: Boxing, Wrestling
majors.description: Skilled in hand-to-hand combat.

majors.name: Fraternity
majors.description: Specialist in street brawling and bonding.

name: Scientific Academy
description: The elite minds of the galaxy pass through these halls. Here, logic, experimentation, and research are honed into powerful tools of innovation and healing.

majors.name: Hardware Engineer
majors.description: Focuses on technological systems and devices.

majors.name: Mechanical Engineer
majors.description: Design and repair of machinery and robotics.

majors.name: General Science
majors.description: Versatile training in scientific methods.

majors.name: Health
majors.description: Medical treatment and biological sciences.
